name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace AI and ML with Lots and Lots of Math

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of the word "AI". "ML" and variants with the phrase "lots and lots of math".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by the "Replace Blockchain with Spreadsheet" extension, this one replaces "AI", "ML", "artificial intelligence" and "machine learning" with the phrase "lots and lots of math.

Met for (deliberately sardonic) comedic purposes.
